name: flux-templating
description: Transform your data into documents. This project integrates various templating and conversion libraries into a RESTful service.

scripts.test: rm -rf coverage && docker run -p 3111:3111 -it --rm --name flux-templating-test -v "$PWD":/usr/src/app -v "$PWD"/coverage:/usr/src/app/coverage flux-templating-dev ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- test/server.js test/integration/*.js
scripts.start-dist: npm run build && docker run -p 3111:3111 -it --rm --name flux-templating-dist flux-templating-dev
scripts.start-detached: npm run build && docker run -p 3111:3111 -d --name flux-templating-detached flux-templating-dev
scripts.stop-detached: docker stop flux-templating-detached && docker rm flux-templating-detached
scripts.test-dist: npm run start-detached && sleep 2 && mocha test/integration/*.js && npm run stop-detached

author: Alban Mouton <alban.mouton@gmail.com>
